mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST(POST_NO, POST_WRITER, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT) VALUES (POST_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{post_writer}, #{post_title}, #{post_content})
mapper.select: SELECT POST_NO, POST_WRITER, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_LIKE, POST_REGDATE FROM ( SELECT POST_NO, POST_WRITER, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, POST_VIEW, POST_LIKE, POST_REGDATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY POST_NO DESC) AS RN FROM POST WHERE 1 = 1 ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY POST_NO DESC
